info.name: GlamRush Admin API
info.description:
API collection for GlamRush Admin Service — Laravel 12 e-commerce admin backend.

Setup:
1. Set the `base_url` variable (e.g. http://localhost:8000)
2. Use the Login endpoint first — the token is auto-saved to `{{token}}`
3. All authenticated endpoints use Bearer token from `{{token}}`

item.name: Auth

request.description: Returns API health status. No authentication required.
Authenticate a user and receive a Sanctum token. The token is automatically saved to the `{{token}}` collection variable.
Create a new admin user account. Requires `Create_User` permission.

response.name: Validation Error
response.body: {"success":false,"message":"Validation failed","data":null,"errors":{"name":["The name field is required."],"email":["The email field must be a valid email address."],"password":["The password field must be at least 8 characters.","The password field confirmation does not match."],"device_id":["The device id field is required."],"role":["The role field is required."]}}

request.description: Revoke the current authentication token.
Get the currently authenticated user's details.
Request a 6-digit password reset code sent to the user's email.
Verify the 6-digit reset code. Returns a temporary token with `password:reset` ability.

Set a new password. Requires a token with `password:reset` ability (obtained from Verify step).

Password requirements: min 8 chars, at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 digit.

item.description: Authentication, account management, and password reset endpoints.

item.name: Categories

request.description: List all categories with pagination. Requires `View_Category` permission.
Get a single category by ID. Requires `View_Category` permission.

Create a new category. Requires `Create_Category` permission.

Uses form-data to support image upload (max 2MB).

response.name: Validation Error
response.body: {"success":false,"message":"Validation failed","data":null,"errors":{"name":["The name field is required."],"is_active":["The is active field is required."]}}

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Electronics Updated",
    "is_active": true,
    "description": "Updated description",
    "parent_id": null,
    "meta_title": null,
    "meta_description": null,
    "meta_keywords": null,
    "sort_order": 1
}

request.description: Update an existing category. Requires `Update_Category` permission.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Electronics Updated",
    "is_active": true,
    "description": "Updated description",
    "parent_id": null,
    "meta_title": null,
    "meta_description": null,
    "meta_keywords": null,
    "sort_order": 1
}

request.description: Soft-delete a category. Requires `Delete_Category` permission.

item.description: Category management endpoints. Supports hierarchical parent-child categories with SEO metadata.

item.name: Brands

request.description: List all brands with pagination. Requires `View_Brand` permission.
Get a single brand by ID. Requires `View_Brand` permission.

Create a new brand. Requires `Create_Brand` permission.

Uses form-data to support logo upload (max 2MB).

response.name: Validation Error
response.body: {"success":false,"message":"Validation failed","data":null,"errors":{"name":["The name field is required."],"code":["The code field is required."]}}

request.description: Update an existing brand. Requires `Update_Brand` permission. All fields are optional.
Soft-delete a brand. Requires `Delete_Brand` permission.

item.description: Brand management endpoints with logo upload support (stored on Google Cloud Storage).

item.name: Products

request.description:
List all products with pagination and filters. Requires `View_Product` permission.

Filters: search, category_id, is_active.
Get a single product with its variants. Requires `View_Product` permission.

Create a simple product (no variants). Requires `Create_Product` permission.

Type options: simple, variable, digital, service.
Status options: published, draft, archived.

response.name: Validation Error
response.body: {"success":false,"message":"Validation failed","data":null,"errors":{"name":["The name field is required."],"type":["The type field is required."],"status":["The status field is required."],"category_id":["The category id field is required."],"brand_id":["The brand id field is required."]}}

formdata.value: Premium running shoes with multiple color options

request.description:
Create a variable product with multiple variants. Requires `Create_Product` permission.

At least one variant must have `is_default: true`.
Variant photos: max 2 images per variant (jpg, jpeg, png, webp; max 5MB each).

formdata.value: Premium running shoes with multiple color options

request.description: Update an existing product. Requires `Update_Product` permission.
Soft-delete a product. Requires `Delete_Product` permission.

item.description: Product management endpoints. Supports simple and variable product types with variants, SKU generation, and media uploads.

item.name: Product Variants

request.description:
Update a specific product variant. Requires `Update_Product` permission.

Note: `product_id` and `slug` fields are prohibited (cannot be changed).
Only one variant per product can be `is_default: true`.
Photos: max 2 images (jpg, jpeg, png, webp; max 5MB each).

Delete a product variant. Requires `Delete_Product` permission.

Note: Cannot delete the only default variant of a product.

item.description: Product variant sub-resource endpoints for updating and deleting individual variants.

item.name: Vendors

request.description: List all vendors with pagination. Requires `View_Vendor` permission.

response.name: Success
response.body: {"success":true,"message":"OK","data":{"current_page":1,"data":[{"id":"01JKVEND1ABC456DEF789GHI","name":"John's Store","business_name":"John's Fashion Outlet","email":"john@vendorstore.com","phone":"+1234567890","code":"JOHN-001","is_active":true,"address_line_1":"123 Main Street","address_line_2":"Suite 100","city":"New York","state":"NY","postal_code":"10001","country":"US","email_verified_at":null,"last_stock_sync_at":null,"created_at":"2026-02-12T10:00:00.000000Z","updated_at":"2026-02-12T10:00:00.000000Z"},{"id":"01JKVEND2DEF789GHI012JKL","name":"Sarah's Boutique","business_name":"Sarah's Premium Boutique","email":"sarah@boutique.com","phone":"+0987654321","code":"SARAH-002","is_active":true,"address_line_1":"456 Fashion Ave","address_line_2":null,"city":"Los Angeles","state":"CA","postal_code":"90001","country":"US","email_verified_at":null,"last_stock_sync_at":null,"created_at":"2026-02-12T10:05:00.000000Z","updated_at":"2026-02-12T10:05:00.000000Z"}],"first_page_url":"http://localhost:8000/api/v1/vendors?page=1","from":1,"last_page":1,"last_page_url":"http://localhost:8000/api/v1/vendors?page=1","links":[{"url":null,"label":"« Previous","active":false},{"url":"http://localhost:8000/api/v1/vendors?page=1","label":"1","active":true},{"url":null,"label":"Next »","active":false}],"next_page_url":null,"path":"http://localhost:8000/api/v1/vendors","per_page":15,"prev_page_url":null,"to":2,"total":2},"errors":null}

request.description: Get a single vendor by ID. Requires `View_Vendor` permission.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John's Store",
    "business_name": "John's Fashion Outlet",
    "email": "john@vendorstore.com",
    "phone": "+1234567890",
    "password": "Password1",
    "code": "JOHN-001",
    "is_active": true,
    "address_line_1": "123 Main Street",
    "address_line_2": "Suite 100",
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "postal_code": "10001",
    "country": "US"
}

request.description:
Create a new vendor. Requires `Create_Vendor` permission.

Required: name, email, password, code.
Optional: business_name, phone, is_active, address fields.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John's Store",
    "business_name": "John's Fashion Outlet",
    "email": "john@vendorstore.com",
    "phone": "+1234567890",
    "password": "Password1",
    "code": "JOHN-001",
    "is_active": true,
    "address_line_1": "123 Main Street",
    "address_line_2": "Suite 100",
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "postal_code": "10001",
    "country": "US"
}

response.name: Validation Error
response.body: {"success":false,"message":"Validation failed","data":null,"errors":{"name":["The name field is required."],"email":["The email field must be a valid email address."],"code":["The code field is required."]}}

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John's Updated Store",
    "business_name": "John's Premium Fashion",
    "phone": "+0987654321",
    "is_active": true,
    "city": "Los Angeles",
    "state": "CA"
}

request.description: Update an existing vendor. Requires `Update_Vendor` permission. All fields are optional.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John's Updated Store",
    "business_name": "John's Premium Fashion",
    "phone": "+0987654321",
    "is_active": true,
    "city": "Los Angeles",
    "state": "CA"
}

request.description: Delete a vendor. Requires `Delete_Vendor` permission.

item.description: Vendor management endpoints for managing marketplace sellers.

item.name: SKU Attribute Codes

request.description:
List all SKU attribute codes with pagination. Requires `View_Vendor` permission.

Search filters by value or code.
Get a single SKU attribute code by ID. Requires `View_Vendor` permission.

Create a new SKU attribute code. Requires `Create_Vendor` permission.

Common types: color, size, storage, material.
Unique constraints: [type, value] and [type, code] must be unique together.

response.name: Validation Error
response.body: {"success":false,"message":"Validation failed","data":null,"errors":{"type":["The type field is required."],"value":["The value field is required."],"code":["The code field is required."]}}

request.description: Update an existing SKU attribute code. Requires `Update_Vendor` permission. All fields are optional.
Delete a SKU attribute code. Requires `Delete_Vendor` permission.

item.description: SKU Attribute Code management endpoints. Used to define variant attributes (color, size, storage, material) with short codes for SKU generation.
